name: Chaos Dragon Heros
description:
Chaos Dragon Herosis a classic fighting games, arcade games still remember childhood memories! Free classic arcade fighting gamet!The most sophisticated battle effects and move presentation, perfectly restored the fighting, give you the finest fighting experience!
Features:
- A challenging arcade game
- Operation Enduring Freedom
-numerous Endless fun adventure
- Unlimited fighting, strive to be the fight hero!
- The classic street fighting environment.
